commits.author: Ian Booth
commits.message:
Merge pull request #3 from gabriel-samfira/fix-typo

fixes typo in json tag

tags.name: v2.0.0
tags.body:
Merge pull request #65 from SimonRichardson/charm-dependencies

https://github.com/juju/bundlechanges/pull/65

As the charm brings in dependency breaking changes (prefix for bundles are required), this ensures that all consumers of this library are fully exposed to the fact that the underlying charm and charmrepo changes are breaking changes and I’m forcing bundlechanges users to understand this.

The number of changes inside go mod and sum are a bit concerning, but all the tests pass, so I’m inclined to leave it as-is for now.

tags.name: v1.0.0
tags.body:
Merge pull request #64 from SimonRichardson/deterministic-master

https://github.com/juju/bundlechanges/pull/64

The following ensure that the applications that we loop through are deterministic, so that when adding application units we skip correctly with in the loop.

This is fixing LP #1883645

Merge pull request #64 from SimonRichardson/deterministic-master

https://github.com/juju/bundlechanges/pull/64

The following ensure that the applications that we loop through are deterministic, so that when adding application units we skip correctly with in the loop.

This is fixing LP #1883645

releases.title: v1.0.0
releases.body:
What’s Changed

  • Initial proposal for juju inclusion. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/1
  • Expose the Init and Flush tabwriter methods. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/2
  • Check for dumb TERM vars, and add method to explicitly set color. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/3
  • Make individual columns able to be right aligned. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/4
  • Fix index out of range panic. by @cmars in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/5
  • Add missing LICENSE file by @aviau in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/6
  • Fix small typo in NewTabWriter comment details by @paddymorgan84 in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/7
  • Color Writer: NO_COLOR support by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/8

New Contributors

  • @howbazaar made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/ansiterm/pull/1

releases.title: v1.0.0
releases.body:
What’s Changed

  • fixes LP 1580391 by @davecheney in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/25
  • Print the stack trace when formatting with %+v by @mkmik in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/28
  • Add forbidden error by @geoffreybauduin in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/30
  • misspell fix on functions.go by @hiveminded in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/31
  • Simplify slice definition by @spring1843 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/32
  • Update for lander. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/35
  • add timeout err by @gertcuykens in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/34
  • made getgopath more accurate by @ycliuhw in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/36
  • typo by @temoto in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/37
  • fix Err.Format by @rogpeppe in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/38
  • Fix typo by @spring1843 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/39
  • Start comments with the name of the element it describes by @spring1843 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/33
  • configurable source trim prefix, default $GOPATH/src by @temoto in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/43
  • docs: fix typos by @Jason-Cooke in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/44
  • Introduce QuotaLimitExceeded error by @achilleasa in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/45
  • Define NotYetAvailable error type by @achilleasa in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/48
  • Refresh deps and use go 1.17 by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/49
  • [JUJU-710] Removes juju/testing from requires. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/51
  • [JUJU-753] Add Err.Unwrap to support standard error library (Go 1.13+) by @barrettj12 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/52
  • [JUJU-754] Updates SetLocation functionality to work with mod. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/53
  • [JUJU-790] Add GitHub Action to run go test by @barrettj12 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/55
  • [JUJU-759] Change error types to use new ConstError by @barrettj12 in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/54
  • Fixes panics found in Juju for nil errors. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/56
  • Independent SetLocation and WithType for errors. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/57
  • [JUJU-1339] Adds a shush method to the library and IsType. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/59
  • Adds support for a new convenience function AsType and HasType. by @tlm in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/60

New Contributors

  • @mkmik made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/28
  • @geoffreybauduin made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/30
  • @hiveminded made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/31
  • @spring1843 made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/32
  • @gertcuykens made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/34
  • @ycliuhw made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/36
  • @temoto made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/37
  • @Jason-Cooke made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/44
  • @achilleasa made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/45
  • @tlm made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/51
  • @barrettj12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/errors/pull/52

Full Changelog: https://github.com/juju/errors/commits/v1.0.0

releases.title: v2.0.0
releases.body:
What’s Changed

  • Code for the juju http wrapper package. by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/1
  • Replace contents of http.Request to add trace features. by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/2
  • Fix NewClient overwriting http.DefaultClient’s Jar field by @benhoyt in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/3
  • Client: Refactor client by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/4
  • Add client option to record outgoing requests by @achilleasa in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/5
  • Retry round tripper by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/6
  • Update to go 1.17 and latest upstream by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/7
  • [JUJU-1119] Do not allow http pkg to cache proxy settings. by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/8
  • Re-enable HTTP keep-alives now that net/http is fixed (as of Go 1.6!) by @benhoyt in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/10
  • Add GitHub Actions workflow to run tests (and check formatting) by @benhoyt in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/11

New Contributors

  • @hmlanigan made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/1
  • @benhoyt made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/3
  • @SimonRichardson made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/4
  • @achilleasa made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/5
  • @wallyworld made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/http/pull/7

Full Changelog: https://github.com/juju/http/commits/v2.0.0

releases.title: Juju 3.6.14
releases.body:
The Juju team is proud to release Juju 3.6.14!

This is a point release to the stable 3.6 series of Juju.

Checkout the Juju 3.6.14 Release Notes

What’s Changed

  • chore: increment juju to 3.6.14 by @jujubot in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21588
  • feat: limit api port access for the controller using juju expose by @adglkh in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20682
  • feat(fatal-login-error): add fatal login error code and logic to tryinorderloginprovider by @SimoneDutto in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21541
  • docs: fix leftover terminal and blueprint issues by @tmihoc in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21578
  • docs: add 3.6.13 release notes by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21610
  • refactor: secret iaas vault integration test by @CodingCookieRookie in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21597
  • docs: add links to 3.6.13 release notes PR references by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21614
  • docs: update readme and build instructions in contributing by @iyiguncevik in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21575
  • feat: update dqlite 1.18.5 by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21656
  • feat: update dqlite 1.18.5 deps by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21658
  • feat: apply db limits to prevent pool exhaustion by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21649
  • chore: revert “Merge pull request #20682 from adglkh/limit_api_port” by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21661

Full Changelog: https://github.com/juju/juju/compare/v3.6.13…v3.6.14

releases.title: Juju 4.0.1
releases.body:
The Juju team is proud to release Juju 4.0.1!

This is a point release to the stable 4.0 series of Juju.

Checkout the Juju 4.0.1 Release Notes

What’s Changed

  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.42.0 to 0.43.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20387
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/tools from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20388
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.41.0 to 0.42.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20581
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20601
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/mod from 0.27.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20602
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20603

  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.42.0 to 0.43.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20857
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21179
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.17.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21180
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.31.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21181
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/term from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21184
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/text from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21185
  • fix: handle case where external secret not found on delete by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21058
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21215
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/tools from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21216
  • fix: timeout idle fds by @jameinel in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21081
  • doc: use new lxd profile naming scheme by @adisazhar123 in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21000
  • test: update vault ci test to use https by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21219
  • feat: remove k8s attach storage feature flag by @jneo8 in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20634
  • feat: remove mongo juju db by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21221
  • feat: upgrade patches by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21150

  • fix: consume offer should take the offer name from offer url by @nvinuesa in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21236

  • feat: get all machines in model with their base by @CodingCookieRookie in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21231

  • feat: populate instanceId for caas units by @adisazhar123 in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21487

  • fix: reduce the scope of the resources the mutating webhook matches on by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21377

  • refactor(modelmigration): remove peer relation import logic by @gfouillet in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21576
  • test: add application import integration tests by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21580
  • refactor: remove LXD profiles by @manadart in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21516

  • test(relation): add integration tests for relation import scenarios by @gfouillet in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21572
  • feat: update to description pkg sha e19a7ca61eb3 by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21594
  • fix: import machine with left over fan addr by @jack-w-shaw in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21593
  • chore: revert removal of unused instancemutater API facade by @manadart in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21599

Full Changelog: https://github.com/juju/juju/compare/v4.0.0…v4.0.1

releases.title: Juju 3.6.13
releases.body:
The Juju team is proud to release Juju 3.6.13!

This is a point release to the stable 3.6 series of Juju.

Checkout the Juju 3.6.13 Release Notes

What’s Changed

  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.42.0 to 0.43.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20387
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/tools from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20388
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.41.0 to 0.42.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20581
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20601
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/mod from 0.27.0 to 0.28.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20602
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20603
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.44.0 to 0.45.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20827
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.42.0 to 0.43.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/20857
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21179
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/sync from 0.17.0 to 0.18.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21180
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.31.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21181
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/term from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21184
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/text from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21185
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.43.0 to 0.44.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21215
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/tools from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21216
  • chore: increment juju to 3.6.13 by @jujubot in https://github.com/juju/juju/pull/21262

releases.title: v1.0.0
releases.body:
What’s Changed

  • Split up logger.go and writer.go. by @ericsnowcurrently in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/14
  • Support non-global loggers. by @ericsnowcurrently in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/13
  • Cleans up package abstractions by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/17
  • Protect write operations with a muxtex by @wallyworld in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/18
  • Missing mutex in public method. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/19
  • Add a color writer and make it the new default. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/20
  • Move ANSI terminal color support into loggocolor by @rogpeppe in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/25
  • Adding the missing . in the comments ;) by @mohsen0 in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/26
  • Fix master by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/28
  • Add Parent and Child methods to the Logger type. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/30
  • Update docs. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/31
  • Add ability to set color capability on loggocolor by @makyo in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/34
  • Move ConfigureLoggers to the Context struct. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/36
  • Add ability to get Root logger from any Logger. by @howbazaar in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/38
  • Logger: Label loggers by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/40
  • Logging config for new loggers by @SimonRichardson in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/43
  • Add GetLoggerWithLabels function by @hmlanigan in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/45

New Contributors

  • @ericsnowcurrently made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/14
  • @wallyworld made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/18
  • @mohsen0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/26
  • @makyo made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/34
  • @SimonRichardson made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/40
  • @hmlanigan made their first contribution in https://github.com/juju/loggo/pull/45

Full Changelog: https://github.com/juju/loggo/commits/v1.0.0
